description: Create and integrate maps in your R workflow. This package allows various cartographic representations such as proportional symbols, chroropleth, typology, flows or discontinuities. In addition, it also proposes some useful features like cartographic palettes, layout (scale, north arrow, title...), labels, legends or access to cartographic API to ease the graphic presentation of maps.
title: cartography
